comments.body: If I understand correctly, these modules are passing the params to the FortiOSAPI, so I was curious to know if these support idempotent transactions?
Correct. It is the fortigate itself (and fortiosapi) the ones in charge of guaranteeing the idempotency of the transactions.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1789,1793 @@        module.fail_json(msg="fortiosapi module is required")

    fos = FortiOSAPI()

    is_error, has_changed, result = fortios_wireless_controller(module.params, fos)
